## ActionTaken enum

The action taken on a suggestion

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum ActionTaken 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Changed | <code>&quot;changed&quot;</code> | The suggestion query has changed either by typing or deleting characters |
|  Entered | <code>&quot;entered&quot;</code> | The suggestion wasn't active before and now it is active |
|  Exited | <code>&quot;exited&quot;</code> | The suggestion was active before and not it is no longer active |
|  Moved | <code>&quot;moved&quot;</code> | We've moved from suggestion to another. |
